item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 15, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. London Stock Exchange suffers biggest exodus since financial crisis
2. Big Chinese naval exercise leaves Taiwan and US struggling for response
3. [Opinion] The London problem is holding young Brits back
4. Sam Altman reckons with a growing threat to OpenAI: Elon Musk
5. Peter Hargreaves’ Blue Whale sells major tech stocks over AI concerns
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 15, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
